findings.title: Unprotected approval function
findings.description: The approve function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The audit report does not explicitly mention this finding, but based on the provided code snippets, it appears that there is no unprotected transfer function vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected allowance function
findings.description: The allowance function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected approveMax function
findings.description: The approveMax function is unprotected and can lead to unauthorized approvals.

findings.title: Unprotected setMaxWalletPercent function
findings.description: The setMaxWalletPercent function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected clearStuckBalance function
findings.description: The clearStuckBalance function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected enableTrading function
findings.description: The enableTrading function is unprotected and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected cooldownEnabled function
findings.description: The cooldownEnabled function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected setIsFeeExempt function
findings.description: The setIsFeeExempt function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized access to fee exemptions.

findings.title: Unprotected setIsTxLimitExempt function
findings.description: The setIsTxLimitExempt function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected setIsTimelockExempt function
findings.description: The setIsTimelockExempt function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected setSellFees function
findings.description: The setSellFees function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected setBuyFees function
findings.description: The setBuyFees function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.
